description: Matrix UI Design System compliance audit for dashboard routes and shared components

/dashboard.notes: Main dashboard with KPI cards, quick add FAB, recent items table

/dashboard/inventory.notes: Inventory table with filters, add/edit forms, P/L icons in margin column

/dashboard/expenses.notes: Expense tracking with category filter, linked item select using sentinel pattern

/dashboard/pnl.notes: P&L KPIs, VAT summary, sold items table with TrendingUp/Down icons, CSV exports

Sidebar.notes: Fixed left nav with icon buttons, focus rings, active state indicators

MobileDock.notes: Bottom nav with safe area insets, 4-tab grid, FAB for quick add

Table.notes: Sticky header, h-12 rows, px-3 md:px-4 py-3 cells, subtle hover, font-mono for numbers

Button.notes: Primary (bg-accent text-black), outline (border-border bg-surface), destructive variants

Select.notes: Radix-based with dev guard for empty values, sentinel pattern (__none__) for clearable

Alert.notes: Destructive variant for errors, proper ARIA roles

Skeleton.notes: 6-row default, h-12 matching table rows, animate-pulse, respects prefers-reduced-motion

pwa.notes: Inter + JetBrains Mono with display:swap, theme-color #050807

dataLayer.notes: All imports use @/lib/supabase/client, no direct createClient usage

exports.notes: UTF-8 BOM for Excel, proper escaping, numeric formatting
